Package br.com.concepting.framework.controller.form.util

Class ActionFormValidator

java.lang.Object
br.com.concepting.framework.controller.form.util.ActionFormValidator
public class ActionFormValidator extends Object
Class responsible to validate a data model.

    • ActionFormValidator

      public ActionFormValidator(F actionForm, SystemController systemController, ActionFormController actionFormController, SecurityController securityController)
      Constructor - Initializes the validation.
      Type Parameters:
      F - Class that defines the form.
      Parameters:
      actionForm - Instance that contains the form.
      systemController - Instance that contains the system controller.
      actionFormController - Instance that contains the action form controller.
      securityController - Instance that contains the security controller.

      Returns:

      InternalErrorException - Occurs when an internal error exception was caught.

    • processContentTypeValidation

      protected void processContentTypeValidation(String propertyName, ContentType propertyContentType, ContentType[] permittedContentTypes) throws ExpectedException, InternalErrorException
      Process the content type validation.
      Parameters:
      propertyName - String that contains the identifier of the property.
      propertyContentType - Instance that contains the content type of the property.
      permittedContentTypes - Array that contains the permitted content types.
      Throws:
      ExpectedException - Occurs when an expected exception was caught.
      InternalErrorException - Occurs when an internal error exception was caught.

      Parameters:
      propertyName - String that contains the identifier of the property.
      propertyContentSize - String that contains the content size.
      permittedContentSize - Numeric value that contains the permitted content sizes.

    • processDateTimeCompareValidation

      protected void processDateTimeCompareValidation(String propertyName, String propertyValue, String propertyPattern, String comparePropertyId, ConditionType comparePropertyCondition) throws ExpectedException, InternalErrorException
      Process the compare date/time validation.
      Parameters:
      propertyName - String that contains the identifier of the property.
      propertyValue - String that contains the value of the property.
      propertyPattern - String that contains the pattern of the property.
      comparePropertyId - String that contains the identifier of the property that will be compared.
      comparePropertyCondition - Instance that contains the condition of comparison.
      Throws:
      ExpectedException - Occurs when an expected exception was caught.
      InternalErrorException - Occurs when an internal error exception was caught.
